# Loopia Provider
This is an inofficial Terraform provider to interact with the [Loopia XML-RPC API](https://www.loopia.se/api/) and it's resources.

## Getting started
1. Log in to the customer zone at [https://loopia.se](https://loopia.se)
2. Create an API user
    - Depending on your use case you might want to restrict the permissions for the access token.
3. Use the API user credentials as input in the provider block.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    loopia = {
      source = "diskoteket/loopia"
    }
  }
}

# Configure the Loopia Provider
provider "loopia" {
  username = "my-api-user-name@loopiaapi"
  password = "my-api-user-password"
}

# Create a subdomain for an existing domain
resource "loopia_subdomain" "something_example_com" {
  subdomain = "something"
  domain    = "example.com"
}
```

## Authentication and Configuration
Configuration for the Loopia provider can be derived from two sources.
1. Parameters in the provider configuration
2. Environment variables

### Environment variables
```bash
export LOOPIA_USERNAME="my-api-user-name@loopiaapi"
export LOOPIA_PASSWORD="my-api-user-password"
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `password` (String, Sensitive) The user password to use for Loopia API authentication
- `username` (String) The user name to use for Loopia API authentication
